Power Split.name: Power Split
Power Split.description: Averages Attack and Sp. Atk stats with target.

Power Swap.name: Power Swap
Power Swap.description: Swaps Attack and Sp. Atk stat stages with target.

Power Trick.name: Power Trick
Power Trick.description: Switches user's Attack and Defense stats.

Power-Up Punch.name: Power-Up Punch
Power-Up Punch.description: 100% chance to raise the user's Attack by 1.

Precipice Blades.name: Precipice Blades
Precipice Blades.description: No additional effect. Hits adjacent foes.

Present.name: Present
Present.description: 40, 80, 120 power, or heals target 1/4 max HP.

Protect.name: Protect
Protect.description: Prevents moves from affecting the user this turn.

Psych Up.name: Psych Up
Psych Up.description: Copies the target's current stat stages.

Psychic.name: Psychic
Psychic.description: 10% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.

Psycho Boost.name: Psycho Boost
Psycho Boost.description: Lowers the user's Sp. Atk by 2.

Psycho Shift.name: Psycho Shift
Psycho Shift.description: Transfers the user's status ailment to the target.

Psyshock.name: Psyshock
Psyshock.description: Damages target based on Defense, not Sp. Def.

Psystrike.name: Psystrike
Psystrike.description: Damages target based on Defense, not Sp. Def.

Psywave.name: Psywave
Psywave.description: Random damage equal to 0.5x-1.5x user's level.

Punishment.name: Punishment
Punishment.description: 60 power +20 for each of the target's stat boosts.

Pursuit.name: Pursuit
Pursuit.description: If a foe is switching out, hits it at 2x power.

Quash.name: Quash
Quash.description: Forces the target to move last this turn.

Quick Guard.name: Quick Guard
Quick Guard.description: Protects allies from priority attacks this turn.

Quiver Dance.name: Quiver Dance
Quiver Dance.description: Raises the user's Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, Speed by 1.

Rage.name: Rage
Rage.description: Raises the user's Attack by 1 if hit during use.

Rage Powder.name: Rage Powder
Rage Powder.description: The foes' moves target the user on the turn used.

Rain Dance.name: Rain Dance
Rain Dance.description: For 5 turns, heavy rain powers Water moves.

Rapid Spin.name: Rapid Spin
Rapid Spin.description: Frees user from hazards, binding, Leech Seed.

Razor Leaf.name: Razor Leaf
Razor Leaf.description: High critical hit ratio. Hits adjacent foes.

Razor Shell.name: Razor Shell
Razor Shell.description: 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.

Razor Wind.name: Razor Wind
Razor Wind.description: Charges, then hits foe(s) turn 2. High crit ratio.

Recover.name: Recover
Recover.description: Heals the user by 50% of its max HP.

Recycle.name: Recycle
Recycle.description: Restores the item the user last used.

Reflect.name: Reflect
Reflect.description: For 5 turns, physical damage to allies is halved.

Reflect Type.name: Reflect Type
Reflect Type.description: User becomes the same type as the target.

Refresh.name: Refresh
Refresh.description: User cures its burn, poison, or paralysis.

Relic Song.name: Relic Song
Relic Song.description: 10% chance to sleep foe(s). Meloetta transforms.

Rest.name: Rest
Rest.description: User sleeps 2 turns and restores HP and status.

Retaliate.name: Retaliate
Retaliate.description: Power doubles if an ally fainted last turn.

Revenge.name: Revenge
Revenge.description: Power doubles if user is damaged by the target.

Reversal.name: Reversal
Reversal.description: More power the less HP the user has left.

Roar.name: Roar
Roar.description: Forces the target to switch to a random ally.

Rock Slide.name: Rock Slide
Rock Slide.description: 30% chance to make the foe(s) flinch.

Rock Smash.name: Rock Smash
Rock Smash.description: 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.

Rock Tomb.name: Rock Tomb
Rock Tomb.description: 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1.

Role Play.name: Role Play
Role Play.description: User replaces its Ability with the target's.

Rolling Kick.name: Rolling Kick
Rolling Kick.description: 30% chance to make the target flinch.

Rollout.name: Rollout
Rollout.description: Power doubles with each hit. Repeats for 5 turns.

Roost.name: Roost
Roost.description: Heals 50% HP. Flying-type removed 'til turn ends.

Rototiller.name: Rototiller
Rototiller.description: Raises Atk/Sp. Atk of grounded Grass types by 1.

Round.name: Round
Round.description: Power doubles if others used Round this turn.

Sacred Fire.name: Sacred Fire
Sacred Fire.description: 50% chance to burn the target. Thaws user.

Sacred Sword.name: Sacred Sword
Sacred Sword.description: Ignores the target's stat stage changes.

Safeguard.name: Safeguard
Safeguard.description: For 5 turns, protects user's party from status.

Sand Tomb.name: Sand Tomb
Sand Tomb.description: Traps and damages the target for 4-5 turns.

Sandstorm.name: Sandstorm
Sandstorm.description: For 5 turns, a sandstorm rages. Rock: 1.5x SpD.

Scald.name: Scald
Scald.description: 30% chance to burn the target. Thaws target.

Secret Power.name: Secret Power
Secret Power.description: Effect varies with terrain. (30% paralysis chance)

Secret Sword.name: Secret Sword
Secret Sword.description: Damages target based on Defense, not Sp. Def.

Seed Flare.name: Seed Flare
Seed Flare.description: 40% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 2.

Seismic Toss.name: Seismic Toss
Seismic Toss.description: Does damage equal to the user's level.

Self-Destruct.name: Self-Destruct
Self-Destruct.description: Hits adjacent Pokemon. The user faints.

Shadow Ball.name: Shadow Ball
Shadow Ball.description: 20% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.

Shadow Force.name: Shadow Force
Shadow Force.description: Disappears turn 1. Hits turn 2. Breaks protection.

Shadow Punch.name: Shadow Punch
Shadow Punch.description: This move does not check pp.

Sheer Cold.name: Sheer Cold
Sheer Cold.description: OHKOs the target. Fails if user is a lower level.

Shell Smash.name: Shell Smash
Shell Smash.description: Lowers Def, SpD by 1; raises Atk, SpA, Spe by 2.

Shift Gear.name: Shift Gear
Shift Gear.description: Raises the user's Speed by 2 and Attack by 1.

Shock Wave.name: Shock Wave
Shock Wave.description: This move does not check pp.

Silver Wind.name: Silver Wind
Silver Wind.description: 10% chance to raise all stats by 1 (not acc/eva).

Sing.name: Sing
Sing.description: Causes the target to fall asleep.

Sketch.name: Sketch
Sketch.description: Permanently copies the last move target used.

Skill Swap.name: Skill Swap
Skill Swap.description: The user and the target trade Abilities.

Skull Bash.name: Skull Bash
Skull Bash.description: Raises user's Defense by 1 on turn 1. Hits turn 2.

Sky Attack.name: Sky Attack
Sky Attack.description: Charges, then hits turn 2. 30% flinch. High crit.

Sky Drop.name: Sky Drop
Sky Drop.description: User and foe fly up turn 1. Damages on turn 2.

Sky Uppercut.name: Sky Uppercut
Sky Uppercut.description: Can hit Pokemon using Bounce, Fly, or Sky Drop.

Slack Off.name: Slack Off
Slack Off.description: Heals the user by 50% of its max HP.

Sleep Powder.name: Sleep Powder
Sleep Powder.description: Causes the target to fall asleep.

Sleep Talk.name: Sleep Talk
Sleep Talk.description: User must be asleep. Uses another known move.

Smelling Salts.name: Smelling Salts
Smelling Salts.description: Power doubles if target is paralyzed, and cures it.

Snarl.name: Snarl
Snarl.description: 100% chance to lower the foe(s) Sp. Atk by 1.

Snatch.name: Snatch
Snatch.description: User steals certain support moves to use itself.

Snore.name: Snore
Snore.description: User must be asleep. 30% chance to flinch target.

Soak.name: Soak
Soak.description: Changes the target's type to Water.

Soft-Boiled.name: Soft-Boiled
Soft-Boiled.description: Heals the user by 50% of its max HP.

Solar Beam.name: Solar Beam
Solar Beam.description: Charges turn 1. Hits turn 2. No charge in sunlight.

Spider Web.name: Spider Web
Spider Web.description: Prevents the target from switching out.

Spikes.name: Spikes
Spikes.description: Hurts grounded foes on switch-in. Max 3 layers.

Spiky Shield.name: Spiky Shield
Spiky Shield.description: Protects from moves. Contact: loses 1/8 max HP.

Spit Up.name: Spit Up
Spit Up.description: More power with more uses of Stockpile.

Spite.name: Spite
Spite.description: Lowers the PP of the target's last move by 4.

Spore.name: Spore
Spore.description: Causes the target to fall asleep.

Stealth Rock.name: Stealth Rock
Stealth Rock.description: Hurts foes on switch-in. Factors Rock weakness.

Steam Eruption.name: Steam Eruption
Steam Eruption.description: 30% chance to burn the target. Thaws target.

Steamroller.name: Steamroller
Steamroller.description: 30% chance to make the target flinch.

Steel Wing.name: Steel Wing
Steel Wing.description: 10% chance to raise the user's Defense by 1.

Sticky Web.name: Sticky Web
Sticky Web.description: Lowers Speed of grounded foes by 1 on switch-in.

Stockpile.name: Stockpile
Stockpile.description: Raises user's Defense, Sp. Def by 1. Max 3 uses.

Stomp.name: Stomp
Stomp.description: 30% chance to make the target flinch.

Stored Power.name: Stored Power
Stored Power.description: + 20 power for each of the user's stat boosts.

Storm Throw.name: Storm Throw
Storm Throw.description: Always results in a critical hit.

Struggle.name: Struggle
Struggle.description: User loses 1/4 of its max HP.

Struggle Bug.name: Struggle Bug
Struggle Bug.description: 100% chance to lower the foe(s) Sp. Atk by 1.

Substitute.name: Substitute
Substitute.description: User takes 1/4 its max HP to put in a substitute.

Sucker Punch.name: Sucker Punch
Sucker Punch.description: Usually goes first. Fails if target is not attacking.

Sunny Day.name: Sunny Day
Sunny Day.description: For 5 turns, intense sunlight powers Fire moves.

Super Fang.name: Super Fang
Super Fang.description: Does damage equal to 1/2 target's current HP.

Superpower.name: Superpower
Superpower.description: Lowers the user's Attack and Defense by 1.

Supersonic.name: Supersonic
Supersonic.description: Causes the target to become confused.

Surf.name: Surf
Surf.description: Hits adjacent Pokemon. Double damage on Dive.

Swagger.name: Swagger
Swagger.description: Raises the target's Attack by 2 and confuses it.

Swallow.name: Swallow
Swallow.description: Heals the user based on uses of Stockpile.

Sweet Kiss.name: Sweet Kiss
Sweet Kiss.description: Causes the target to become confused.

Swift.name: Swift
Swift.description: This move does not check pp. Hits foes.

Switcheroo.name: Switcheroo
Switcheroo.description: User switches its held item with the target's.

Synchronoise.name: Synchronoise
Synchronoise.description: Hits adjacent Pokemon sharing the user's type.

Synthesis.name: Synthesis
Synthesis.description: Heals the user by a weather-dependent amount.

Tail Glow.name: Tail Glow
Tail Glow.description: Raises the user's Sp. Atk by 3.

Tailwind.name: Tailwind
Tailwind.description: For 4 turns, allies' Speed is doubled.

Taunt.name: Taunt
Taunt.description: Target can't use status moves its next 3 turns.

Techno Blast.name: Techno Blast
Techno Blast.description: Type varies based on the held Drive.

Telekinesis.name: Telekinesis
Telekinesis.description: For 3 turns, target floats but moves can't miss it.

Thief.name: Thief
Thief.description: If the user has no item, it steals the target's.

Thousand Arrows.name: Thousand Arrows
Thousand Arrows.description: Grounds adjacent foes. First hit neutral on Flying.

Thousand Waves.name: Thousand Waves
Thousand Waves.description: Hits adjacent foes. Prevents them from switching.

Thrash.name: Thrash
Thrash.description: Lasts 2-3 turns. Confuses the user afterwards.

Thunder.name: Thunder
Thunder.description: 30% chance to paralyze. Can't miss in rain.

Thunder Fang.name: Thunder Fang
Thunder Fang.description: 10% chance to paralyze. 10% chance to flinch.

Tickle.name: Tickle
Tickle.description: Lowers the target's Attack and Defense by 1.

Torment.name: Torment
Torment.description: Target can't select the same move twice in a row.

Toxic.name: Toxic
Toxic.description: Badly poisons the target. Poison types can't miss.

Toxic Spikes.name: Toxic Spikes
Toxic Spikes.description: Poisons grounded foes on switch-in. Max 2 layers.

Transform.name: Transform
Transform.description: Copies target's stats, moves, types, and Ability.

Tri Attack.name: Tri Attack
Tri Attack.description: 20% chance to paralyze or burn or freeze target.

Trick.name: Trick
Trick.description: User switches its held item with the target's.

Trick Room.name: Trick Room
Trick Room.description: Goes last. For 5 turns, turn order is reversed.

Trick-or-Treat.name: Trick-or-Treat
Trick-or-Treat.description: Adds Ghost to the target's type(s).

Triple Kick.name: Triple Kick
Triple Kick.description: Hits 3 times. Each hit can miss, but power rises.

Trump Card.name: Trump Card
Trump Card.description: More power the fewer PP this move has left.

Twineedle.name: Twineedle
Twineedle.description: Hits 2 times. Each hit has 20% chance to poison.

Twister.name: Twister
Twister.description: 20% chance to make the foe(s) flinch.

U-turn.name: U-turn
U-turn.description: User switches out after damaging the target.

Uproar.name: Uproar
Uproar.description: Lasts 3 turns. Active Pokemon cannot fall asleep.

V-create.name: V-create
V-create.description: Lowers the user's Defense, Sp. Def, Speed by 1.

Venom Drench.name: Venom Drench
Venom Drench.description: Lowers Atk/Sp. Atk/Speed of poisoned foes by 1.

Venoshock.name: Venoshock
Venoshock.description: Power doubles if the target is poisoned.

Vital Throw.name: Vital Throw
Vital Throw.description: This move does not check pp. Goes last.

Volt Switch.name: Volt Switch
Volt Switch.description: User switches out after damaging the target.

Volt Tackle.name: Volt Tackle
Volt Tackle.description: Has 33% recoil. 10% chance to paralyze target.

Wake-Up Slap.name: Wake-Up Slap
Wake-Up Slap.description: Power doubles if target is asleep, and wakes it.

Water Pledge.name: Water Pledge
Water Pledge.description: Use with Grass or Fire Pledge for added effect.

Water Shuriken.name: Water Shuriken
Water Shuriken.description: Usually goes first. Hits 2-5 times in one turn.

Water Sport.name: Water Sport
Water Sport.description: For 5 turns, Fire-type attacks have 1/3 power.

Water Spout.name: Water Spout
Water Spout.description: Less power as user's HP decreases. Hits foe(s).

Waterfall.name: Waterfall
Waterfall.description: 20% chance to make the target flinch.

Weather Ball.name: Weather Ball
Weather Ball.description: Power doubles and type varies in each weather.

Whirlpool.name: Whirlpool
Whirlpool.description: Traps and damages the target for 4-5 turns.

Whirlwind.name: Whirlwind
Whirlwind.description: Forces the target to switch to a random ally.

Wide Guard.name: Wide Guard
Wide Guard.description: Protects allies from multi-target damage this turn.

Wish.name: Wish
Wish.description: Next turn, 50% of the user's max HP is restored.

Wonder Room.name: Wonder Room
Wonder Room.description: For 5 turns, all Defense and Sp. Def stats switch.

Work Up.name: Work Up
Work Up.description: Raises the user's Attack and Sp. Atk by 1.

Wrap.name: Wrap
Wrap.description: Traps and damages the target for 4-5 turns.

Wring Out.name: Wring Out
Wring Out.description: More power the more HP the target has left.

Yawn.name: Yawn
Yawn.description: Puts the target to sleep after 1 turn.

Zen Headbutt.name: Zen Headbutt
Zen Headbutt.description: 20% chance to make the target flinch.
